1464995176871763.name: AMS Firstweek Presents: Pancake Breakfast
1464995176871763.description:
Who doesn’t love a FREE breakfast? Come enjoy the most important meal of the day West of the Nest outside of Honour Roll Sushi!
 
Catch up with new and old pals alike over free pancakes as you walk to your first class of the day.
 
Don't add too much syrup. Kidding. Drench those pancakes; you’ve got nothing to lose and a Freshman 15 to gain!

Catch us:
Monday Sept 11 & Tuesday Sept 12th / 8:30am - 10:30am

2037693893130984.description:

1730375513929057.name: AMS Firstweek 2017
1730375513929057.description:
There’s nothing like your first week. 

AMS Firstweek is the Official Campus Wide Welcome Week by your Student Society - The AMS. Created entirely by students, for students, this two-week long festival is the essential way to start off your time at UBC. 

Don’t miss out ---> http://bit.ly/2bmPm50 

Events: 

⚡Capture the Flag
A battle of epic proportions. Throw it back to grade school with a game of capture the flag, university style. We’ll bring the glow sticks and DJ, you bring the competition. 

⚡Firstweek Flix
Grab your blankets, grab your friends, and head out to your new backyard for this cozy little movie night under the stars. Courtesy of your student body, the AMS.

⚡Imagine Day
Come together with the entire Class of 2021 for the first and only time while you’re at UBC to be formally welcomed to the University and celebrate the start of your UBC journey!
Your campus will be transformed to provide you with the chance to meet some great people, to sign up for as many clubs as your heart desires, and to pick up your AMS Firstweek Kit at the AMS Firstweek booth!

⚡Yoga 
Come stretch out muscles and mind to start the week off refreshed with free yoga at the Nest!
The largest outdoor yoga class on campus! Professional yoga instructors will be here to lead a soothing class, that will calm your mind and detox your body from an amazing AMS Firstweek. Prepare for the start of your scholarly endeavours by getting your Zen on, and potentially your Lululemons…

⚡Comedy Show 
Everyone likes to laugh so join us for one of the funniest events of the year! Laugh along with hundreds of other students as acclaimed local comedians emcee an event you’ll be sure to leave with a smile. A smash success every year, the annual AMS Firstweek Comedy Show is guaranteed to leave you in stitches.

⚡Ultimate Paint Party 
Get ready to get down, dirty, and drenched in every colour while you dance the night away at AMS Firstweek’s Ultimate Paint Party!! Coming in full steam with production there won’t be a spot of white on the dance floor. This is the year's first all ages party in the Great Hall so we’re making it bigger and better than ever. You definitely won’t want to miss out!

⚡Coffee for Commuters
That long bus ride to campus got you feeling down? Look no further! Every morning, right outside the bookstore, the AMS Firstweek team will be dishing out smiles and FREE coffee! Kick-start your day with a nice, hot cup(s?) of joe!

⚡AMS Welcome Back BBQ 
Come ring in the new school year at the AMS Welcome Back BBQ, an outdoor music festival with all of your friends, famous artists, and good vibes! One of the biggest and best events of the year, with a 19+ beer garden to keep the party going and an all ages dance floor in front of the stage!


PLUS don’t forget about Coffee for Commuters, Improv shows, Live at Lunch, Pancake Breakfasts, Trivia Night, Open Mic, Pastels and Pinot + more 


*Entry to all events is free with purchase of AMS Firstweek kit, but this subject to capacity 

Got questions? Ask us below or email us at firstweek@ams.ubc.ca 

Got Snapchat? Add us: amsevents

Connect Online:
www.amsfirstweek.com
www.facebook.com/amsfirstweek
www.facebook.com/AMSEventsUBC
www.instagram.com/ams_ubc

471013626585051.name: VSEUS Presents: Bachelor of Arts Welcome - The Pin Ceremony

owner.name: UBC Vancouver School of Economics Undergraduate Society

place.name: UBC Vancouver School of Economics Undergraduate Society

471013626585051.description:
Dear incoming 3rd year Economics students,

We at UBC Vancouver School of Economics (VSE) would like to invite you to the first annual Bachelor of Arts Welcome - The Pin Ceremony on Tuesday, September 5th, 2017. This new initiative has been created to formally welcome you as a new member of our community, as you embark on your new journey studying at one of Canada's best schools of economics. You will be awarded with a VSE pin, which symbolizes your hard work and dedication on this milestone of your university career. 

-Exclusive UBC Vancouver School of Economics pins
-Meet your Class of 2019 cohort 
-Learn about how to get involved at our club booths
-Free food and more! 

Grab your ticket by Friday, August 18th at 11:30pm!

https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/vse-presents-bachelor-of-arts-welcome-the-pin-ceremony-tickets-34934387694

1826649354276843.name: SUS First Week 2017
1826649354276843.description:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Hey, Science! School is just around the corner, but classes aren’t the only thing coming your way... because we’ve got you covered with SUS First Week!

Start your year off right with tons of FREE FOOD and FREE MERCH, and see why the school year is definitely #BetterInBlue! 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

● Imagine Day & Science Faculty Fair ●
Tuesday, September 5th | Outside the UBC Bookstore
★ Come to the SUS booth on Imagine Day to grab tons of FREE merch (including BAGS, LANYARDS, and MORE). Keep yourself fueled with some ice-cold freezies, freshly popped popcorn & fresh fruit as well! Then, check out the Science Faculty Fair and see what science clubs and the SUS have in store for you this year!

● SUS Carnival ●
Wednesday, September 6th | 11 - 3 pm | Abdul Ladha SSC
★ What is life without carnival games & food??? Featuring tabletop games, Jumbo Jenga and a UBC REC booth, attempt games for a chance to win prizes from various hotspots and restaurants in Metro Vancouver. Recharging from the games? Indulge in our decadent cotton candy and check out the Sales booth on the front porch!

● SUStenance Food Fest ●
Thursday, September 7th | 11 - 3 pm| Abdul Ladha SSC
★ Is that the smell of FREE food? Pick up a taco from La Taqueria, a Grounds for Coffee cinnamon bun, or some Kernels popcorn to keep your brain going on the back-to-school grind. Or compete in our Chubby Bunny contest to win gift cards from Cheesecake etc., and other restaurant’s around Vancouver! 

● Flashback Friday Kickback (19+) ●
Friday, September 8th | 1 - 4 pm | Abdul Ladha SSC
★ Get pre-LIT for the AMS Welcome Back BBQ (or any other Friday night party) with $2 Ice-cold beers and specialty SUS Cocktails, and snack on some FREE pizza on the side! Join us too for a karaoke sing-a-long, featuring Flashback songs from the 2000s (We’re bringing Britney back). 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Need more fun? Then, check out: 

AMS Firstweek 
www.amsfirstweek.com

Science RXN 2017 (UBC Science Orientation)
www.susrxnubc.com
